EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Cloud Native Workshop_Missouri_Q415.Follow Up - No show
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=There}},
We’re sorry you were unable to attend the Cloud Native Workshop in St. Louis on December 10th.
Workshop attendees got hands-on experience using Pivotal Cloud Foundry and Spring, and we invite you to do the same. Visit run.pivotal.io <[[http://run.pivotal.io/]]> to try Pivotal Web Services - simply upload your files and your app just works! Additionally, we’ve made the workshop presentations available here <[[https://github.com/cbusch-pivotal/SpringCloudWorkshop]]> so you can catch up on what you missed.
Interested in learning more what being Cloud Native can do for your organization? Contact us <[[mailto:block@pivotal.io]]> to schedule a technical evaluation with our team.
For upcoming events visit us at Pivotal.io <[[http://pivotal.io/news-events]]> and select the events tab. We look forward to seeing you soon!
The Pivotal Team
